gdrive.code_description: To obtain authenticate code, please navigate to Link. Click and navigate to . Press to proceed. Finally copy code to below field and press ok to authenticate
gdrive.old_description: To obtain Google Drive 'Client ID' / 'Client secret', open Link. You may leave project name by default. On next page select 'Desktop app'. Click create. Copy Client ID/Client secret to correspond fields. Then fire 'OAuth2 Authenticate' in context menu to fetch Google Drive 'Code' and paste it to field.
gdrive.description:
Create a service account tutorial:
  1. Create new project
  2. Enable Google Drive API
  3. Create service account (Select project to link account to)
  4. Click the Keys tab and press button to create key(JSON type)
  5. Clicking Create downloads a service account key file
  6. In the context menu select and upload saved key file
  7. Go to Google Drive, create folder and share it with below email
